name: Unamused Face
baseMeaning: A yellow face with slightly raised eyebrows, a frown, and eyes looking to the side.
tldr: Clearly shows displeasure, skepticism, or 'I'm not impressed'.

contextMeanings.meaning: Expressing skepticism about a claim or situation.
The 'not impressed' face for underwhelming situations.

platformNotes.note: Used for calling out bad takes or expressing disbelief.
Clearly communicates displeasure - can escalate conversations.
Generally too negative for professional communication.

generationalNotes.note: Standard for expressing 'not impressed' or mild annoyance.
Used to show displeasure or skepticism clearly.
May find too passive-aggressive for regular use.

warnings.title: Clearly negative
warnings.description: This emoji unambiguously expresses displeasure. Use carefully as it can create tension.
